{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4189883,"totalDownVotes":765072,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":289857,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1089436,"totalDownVotes":116093,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":318004,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
I want to sincerely thank all of you who voted for Brookhaven and the amazing people in the Roblox community who come to play it. I was humbled to be nominated and am beyond grateful to be chosen, especially with so many incredible games and creators to choose from.

Thx for playing!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":596199,"totalDownVotes":46233,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":78969,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1010933,"totalDownVotes":50754,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":48065,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 2.25q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 18]:
- 💸SALE!
- 🌟SEASON 4!
- ⚔️NEW TOURNAMENT MODE!
- 💥3 NEW QUIRKS!
- 🔴1 NEW BLOODLINE!
- 🍋1 NEW FRUIT!
- 👿NEW BOSS!
- 🐰EASTER EVENT!
- 🌌NEW AURA CHEST!
- 🥚EASTER DECORATION!
- 🔥2 NEW POWERS!
- 🛡️5 NEW CHAMPIONS!
- 💪3 NEW TRAINING AREAS!
- ⚔️8 NEW SWORD SKINS!
- 🗡️1 NEW SWORD!
- ⚖️POWER BALANCING!

⭐Join BlockZone for a 5% increased training boost:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/5202664/BlockZone#!/about

🎁Follow us on Twitter for codes and updates on the game:
Director: @NyxunRBX
Head Developers: @RobxSoft, @_Chichine
Scripters: @_DevCrow, @eXo0ne_, @lyzrinn, @Dact_ylioglyph
Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3741978,"totalDownVotes":308369,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":72537,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":888277,"totalDownVotes":56863,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE + 2x EXP] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":40829,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2747286,"totalDownVotes":360709,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":34674,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Graj z innymi graczami i wygrywaj arsenałem, którym dysponujesz! Rzuć wyzwanie swoim przeciwnikom w grze typu Arcade, gdzie przeciwnik czyha na każdym rogu. Poprzez karabiny maszynowe i pistolety, po książki magiczne i bazooki, każda broń jest losowa i nigdy nie wiesz, co dostaniesz! Zbieraj bucksy i pokaż swój styl, używając masę różnych postaci, broni białej, efektów zabójstwa i innymi kosmetycznymi przedmiotami!

Na język ten przełożył - siematunoki
"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":256069,"totalDownVotes":32973,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":24968,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3211997,"totalDownVotes":280425,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":49826,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2064674,"totalDownVotes":286030,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":41289,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":359667,"totalDownVotes":36256,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[KAPI] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":25853,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1408125,"totalDownVotes":118425,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":34601,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2113364,"totalDownVotes":652934,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":58064,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":134439,"totalDownVotes":7551,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA 🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":13551,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1182916,"totalDownVotes":67606,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":22698,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":517946,"totalDownVotes":36124,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":18803,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities
⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool
🐤Developers: Tacomura, AStrongMuscle, MoltenPrime, AngeIicMar
🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2308407,"totalDownVotes":242441,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":52257,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":908597,"totalDownVotes":118301,"universeId":892043755,"name":"Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":10583,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 74 🚨
🐰 Easter has arrived at Bubble Gum Simulator!
😮 Check out the event area in the main world!
🏆 10 eggs have been hidden - follow the clues to complete this year’s special Egg Hunt!
🥚 3 new eggs (Cracked Egg, Eastery Egg, Cosmic Egg)
🐶 48 new pets!
🔥 ????
💪 Complete Easter Event challenges every day to earn exclusive prizes!
🏆 Unlock special rewards for completing the Easter Pass!
🎮 Gamepad controls improved

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":91017,"totalDownVotes":7432,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[JOJO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":10126,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This is Anime Mania. Upon joining the game, it is suggested that you spend some of the gems that you have rolling on a few characters. Then you should equip 3 of these characters in order to make your team. After making your team, you can play the game by starting a room and you can either invite your friends or play alone. Obtain more characters, win the arenas, and upgrade your characters! 

PC Controls:
Left Click: Basic Attack
Right Click: Heavy Attack
1,2,3,4- Character Skills
Jump + Left Click: Up Combo
Left Click In air: Air finish or simply use a move.

Inspired by Ani-Blox Legends, and All Star Tower Defense.

Owners: 123imnotm0mo and Yakrus
Developers: jacobman737, Lazarovip2,F33NY
Contributors: Swingset68, Arricku,Elikage,LightTheProtagonist, Rinanori"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1789173,"totalDownVotes":139667,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7497,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":657462,"totalDownVotes":127677,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":7289,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!
Check them out: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928




"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":263245,"totalDownVotes":139403,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":13663,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":510397,"totalDownVotes":42078,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":12018,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Bu dünyada, hiçbir kimse tek başına hayatta kalamaz. 
Arkadaşların ile sayısız dalgalara kafa tutmak, patronlarla savaşmak, para kazanıp, seviye atlayıp yeni kuleler açmak için bir takım kur! Eğer daha zor bir şeyler denemek istersen daha büyük zorluk derecelerinde daha zor patronlara karşı savaşmayı dene! 
 
👥💵 Ekstra +$100 para için gruba katılabilirsiniz
https://www.roblox.com/groups/49144944

👍Daha kaliteli güncellemeler için beğen ve favorile!🌟

⚠️BU OYUN HALA BETA'DA, SIKINTI OLMASI OLASIDIR⚠️

🛠️GÜNCELLEMELER🛠️
+ OYUNCAK KASASI 📦
+ İLKBAHAR ATEŞİ HARİTASI🌼
+ GÜÇLENDİRİLMİŞ KULELER
+ Hata düzeltmeleri

🛠️ Bütün güncelleme kaydını burada okuyun: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-update-log

Emeği Geçenler:
Öncü Yapımcı/Dizayn: BelowNatural
Kodlayıcı: Razuatix
İnşaatçılar: BiscuitTurtleKid & Beefchoplets
Müzik Bestecisi: Phoqus
Dizayn: BiddinUp"},{"creatorId":3642592,"creatorName":"Schwifty Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1275776,"totalDownVotes":275608,"universeId":498490399,"name":"Mad City","placeId":1224212277,"playerCount":9897,"imageToken":"T_1224212277_2d87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The boss and gift event has ended! Congratulations to the people who won the rewards!

Welcome to Mad City, where the choice is yours to choose the power of good or evil. Cause chaos in the city streets as a criminal and super villain or join the super heroes and police force to bring justice to the city. With so many heists, the chaos never stops!

Follow the developers on twitter for updates and special codes:
Lead Developer: @Taymastar 
Lead Programmer: @ChiefDaysRBLX @osedaycan
World Builder: @FamedChris & @TheGemini_II
3D Modeler: @Nic10Telf
Official Twitter: @SchwiftyStudios

LAST UPDATE:
🦌Boss Battle
🎁Gift Rewards
❄️Winter Map
☃️More!

Special thanks to these awesome people: 
@TacticalFrosty @rightIess @kiouhei @Mockerii @Ep1cDrew @PixelatedCandy @DevFoxby @ItsAmmon @PerhapzRBLX @FoxOfJulyy"},{"creatorId":9162125,"creatorName":"InnoVision","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":50822,"totalDownVotes":4191,"universeId":2331157949,"name":"[UPDATE 4] Super Evolution [BETA]","placeId":6312753269,"playerCount":9532,"imageToken":"T_6312753269_3041","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Current Codes: 45KLIKES, 10MVISITS (And secret Codes around the Map!)

Welcome to Super Evolution! Train your Strength, Endurance, Energy and Agility to become the Strongest Saiyan in the Universe! Will you top the Leaderboards and awaken your full potential?

📝 UPDATE 4: 📝
- BOSS FIGHTS!
- Reputation - Are you Good or Evil?
- 3 New Leaderboards
- Key Binding
- New INSANE Capsule
- Brand New Ki Type!
- 10 New Quests
- 3 New Stat Upgrades

Based around the Bonita Springs area, Southwest Florida is a roleplay game that offers a variety of jobs, vehicles, and more! 

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
